<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aura of Faith](/Feats.aspx?ID=243) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 113 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of good](/Tenets.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power. Your Strikes deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures. Also, each good-aligned ally within 15 feet gains this benefit on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.
name: Aura of Faith
